SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.id AS ID, a.sender_id, a.receiver_id, m.material_name, d.commit_date, a.is_read, ( CASE
WHEN a.sender_type = '0' THEN '系统消息' WHEN a.sender_type = '1' THEN r1.realname WHEN a.sender_type = '2' THEN s2.realname WHEN a.sender_type = '3' THEN s3.realname END ) NAME, a.gmt_create AS TIME, msg_id AS CONTENT, a.sender_id AS auditId, 'C' AS TYPE, ( CASE
WHEN a.sender_type = '0' THEN 'DEFAULT' WHEN a.sender_type = '1' THEN r1.avatar WHEN a.sender_type = '2' THEN s2.avatar WHEN a.sender_type = '3' THEN s3.avatar END ) avatar, a.is_read AS online_progress, a.material_id AS materialId FROM user_message a LEFT JOIN writer_user s2 ON a.sender_id = s2.id AND a.sender_type = 2 LEFT JOIN org_user s3 ON a.sender_id = s3.id AND a.sender_type = 3 LEFT JOIN pmph_user r1 ON a.sender_id = r1.id AND a.sender_type = 1 LEFT JOIN declaration d ON d.user_id = a.sender_id LEFT JOIN material m ON m.id = d.material_id WHERE receiver_type = 3 AND a.is_withdraw = 0
AND a.is_deleted = 0 AND a.msg_type IN ( 1, 0 ) AND ( d.commit_date <= date_add( a.gmt_create, INTERVAL '10' MINUTE ) OR d.commit_date <= date_add( a.gmt_create, INTERVAL '-10' MINUTE ) OR d.commit_date >= date_add( a.gmt_create, INTERVAL '10' MINUTE ) OR d.commit_date >= date_add( a.gmt_create, INTERVAL '-10' MINUTE ) ) AND d.commit_date <= '2019-11-26 00:00:00.0' AND d.commit_date >= '2019-11-7 00:00:00.0' AND a.gmt_create <= '2019-11-26 00:00:00.0' AND a.gmt_create >= '2019-11-7 00:00:00.0' ) t3 ORDER BY TIME DESC, sender_id DESC LIMIT 0, 100000

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT d.realname AS NAME,d.gmt_create AS gmt_create,m.`material_name` AS CONTENT, d.material_id AS AUDITID,"A" AS TYPE,d.gmt_update AS UPDATETIME,d.`online_progress` AS PROGRESS,w.avatar,p.declaration_id FROM declaration d LEFT JOIN material m ON d.`material_id` = m.`id` LEFT JOIN org_user u ON d.`org_id` = u.`org_id` left join writer_user w on d.user_id = w.id LEFT JOIN dec_position AS p ON d.id = p.declaration_id WHERE u.`id` = #{parameter.userId} AND d.online_progress IN(2,3) ) t1 UNION SELECT * FROM ( SELECT w1.realname,w.gmt_create AS gmt_create,"教师资格认证",w1.id,"B",w1.gmt_update,w.progress,w1.avatar,w.id as writer_user_certification_id FROM writer_user_certification w LEFT JOIN org_user u1 ON w.org_id = u1.org_id LEFT JOIN writer_user w1 ON w1.id= w.user_id WHERE u1.`id` = #{parameter.userId} AND w.progress IN(2,3) ) t2 UNION SELECT * FROM( SELECT d.realname AS NAME,d.gmt_create AS gmt_create,m.`product_name` AS CONTENT, d.product_id AS AUDITID,"C" AS TYPE,d.gmt_update AS UPDATETIME,d.`online_progress` AS PROGRESS,w.avatar,d.id FROM expertation d LEFT JOIN product m ON d.`product_id` = m.`id` LEFT JOIN org_user u ON d.`org_id` = u.`org_id` left join writer_user w on d.user_id = w.id WHERE u.`id` = #{parameter.userId} AND d.online_progress IN(2,3) ) t3 ORDER BY gmt_create DESC limit #{start},#{pageSize}
